1607948770_19rSc8YfLc5CKq528uKnDuerT2PZo.body: you can´t really detect the source of cyberattacks.. There might be some indications, but it would be easy for someone to fake his location / include hints to government hacking groups from foreign countries.. Don´t believe these stories.. In reality, they can´t really tell from where the attack originated.

1611909944_1HTbdyz4zToxkxfmuYYfNVN1Y3U2y.body:
So choices:
- No Covid, No Vacine = best choice
- No Covid, Get Vacinated = middle ground
- Have Covid, No Vacine = worst choice

My opinion: The risks you face when getting covid are more severe than the risks you face when getting vacinated (as of current knowlegde).
I personally would prefer to not ahve the vacine, but i think this is no real choice, as you will get covid sooner or later if you do that.. So i personally will get vacinated, but i will wait a littlbit before doing it, to see the effictivness of different vacines and their risks.
